description: Chair will have you dining or meeting in more comfort and style than ever before. Fully upholstered in leather, this seat steals the show, and rightfully so. Its unique design provides padded, wraparound support with slim, curved arms and slightly tilted backrest, finished with casters, instead of fixed legs. From dining space to conference room, this mobile seat makes coming to the table easy and enjoyable.
A table often fitted with drawers and a mirror in front of which one sits while dressing and grooming oneself

The modern sofas for living room fascinates onlookers with its fine and light design. The cushions compel you to stay seated. Thanks to its compact structure and the headrest neatly stowed away in the backrest, the home center corner sofa fits perfectly in any room. It also meets all the individual wishes with four sizes, reclining and extension elements.Frame made of solid and plywood, padded with non-deformable expanded polyurethane of differentiated density.
